sqlMap.select: select ITEMID from MI704 where CENTERID = #centerId:VARCHAR# and UPDICID IN (select DICID from MI704 where UPDICID=#newspapertimes:VARCHAR# and CENTERID = #centerId:VARCHAR#) group by ITEMID order by ABS(ITEMID) asc

select ITEMID, ITEMVAL from MI704 where CENTERID = #centerId:VARCHAR# and UPDICID IN (select DICID from MI704 where UPDICID=#newspapertimes:VARCHAR# and CENTERID = #centerId:VARCHAR# and ITEMID = #newspaperforum:VARCHAR#) order by ABS(ITEMID) asc
